mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.fans_num AS "fansNum", a.gender AS "gender", a.imgs AS "imgs", a.shop_plate AS "shopPlate", a.title AS "title", a.user_plate AS "userPlate", a.price AS "price", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.status AS "status", a.order_no AS "orderNo", a.offer_template_id AS "offerTemplateId", a.user_id AS "userId", a.approve_date AS "approveDate", a.lock_date AS "lockDate", a.finsh_date AS "finshDate", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.enable_flag AS "enableFlag"
mapper.select: select b.wx_name as 'wxName', b.avatar_url as 'headPic', a.title as 'offerTitle', a.imgs as 'offerPic', a.fans_num as 'fanNums', a.price as 'price', a.id as 'id', c.offersTag as 'tag' from ho_offers a left join ho_user_basic b on a.user_id = b.id left join ( select a.offer_id as 'offerId', GROUP_CONCAT(b.dict_value) as 'offersTag', GROUP_CONCAT(b.id) as 'offersTagId' from ho_offer_tag a left join ho_dict b on b.id =a.dict_id group by a.offer_id ) c on c.offerId=a.id where 1=1 and a.status='3' order by a.create_date desc

select b.wx_name as 'wxName', b.avatar_url as 'headPic', a.shop_plate as 'shopPlate', d.dict_value as 'starPlate', a.fans_num as 'fanNums', a.title as 'offerTitle', a.remarks as 'remarks', a.imgs as 'offerPic', a.status as 'status', a.order_no as 'orderNo', a.create_date as 'createDate', a.approve_date as 'approveDate', a.lock_date as 'lockDate', a.finsh_date as 'finshDate' from ho_offers a left join ho_user_basic b on a.user_id=b.id left join ho_dict d on d.id=a.user_plate where a.id=#{id}

select a.id as 'id', a.title as 'title', a.fans_num as 'fansNum', a.remarks as 'remarks', a.price as 'price', a.imgs as 'pic', z.tags as 'tags', a.status as 'status', b.sell_approve as 'sellApprove', b.star_approve as 'starApprove', c.phone_no as 'phoneNo', c.wx_name as 'sellName' from ho_offers a left join ho_snatch_offer b on a.id=b.offer_id left join ho_user_basic c on c.id=a.user_id left join ( select a.offer_id as 'offerId' ,GROUP_CONCAT(b.dict_value) as 'tags' from ho_offer_tag a left join ho_dict b on a.dict_id=b.id group by a.offer_id ) z on z.offerId=a.id where b.user_id=#{starUserId}
and a.status in ('AP','FN','RA','RN')
and a.status in ('LK') and b.if_select='1'
and a.status in ('FN') and b.if_select='1'
order by b.create_date desc

select a.id as 'id', a.imgs as 'pic', a.fans_num as 'fansNum', c.title as 'title', z.tags as 'tags',
b.phone_no as 'phoneNo', b.id as 'starIds', d.sell_approve as 'sellApprove', d.star_approve as 'starApprove', b.wx_name as 'wxName', b.avatar_url as 'headPic',
a.status as 'status', a.remarks as 'remarks' from ho_offers a
left join ho_user_basic b on a.user_id=b.id
left join ho_snatch_offer d on d.offer_id = a.id and d.if_select='1' left join ho_user_basic b on b.id=d.user_id
left join ho_offer_template c on c.id=a.offer_template_id left join ( select a.offer_id as 'offerId' ,GROUP_CONCAT(b.dict_value) as 'tags' from ho_offer_tag a left join ho_dict b on a.dict_id=b.id group by a.offer_id ) z on z.offerId=a.id where a.enable_flag='1' and a.user_id=#{userId}
and a.status in ('PY','NAP')
and a.status in ('AP','RA')
and a.status in ('FN','RN')
order by a.create_date desc

select a.id as 'id', b.wx_name as 'wxName', b.phone_no as 'sellerPhone', b.avatar_url as 'headPic', d.dict_value as 'platName', a.title as 'title', a.price as 'price', a.remarks as 'infos', a.create_date as 'createDate', a.imgs as 'pics', a.order_no as 'orderNo', a.fans_num as 'fansNums', a.status as 'status', temp.tags as 'tags'
from ho_offers a left join ho_user_basic b on a.user_id=b.id left join ho_dict d on d.id=a.user_plate left join ( select offer_id,GROUP_CONCAT(d.dict_value) as 'tags' from ho_offer_tag a left join ho_dict d on d.id=a.dict_id group by offer_id )temp on temp.offer_id=a.id where a.enable_flag='1'
and a.status=#{type}
and b.wx_name like concat('%',#{wxName},'%')
order by a.create_date desc

select a.id as 'id', b.wx_name as 'wxName', b.phone_no as 'sellerPhone', b.avatar_url as 'headPic', d.dict_value as 'platName', a.title as 'title', a.price as 'price', a.remarks as 'infos', a.create_date as 'createDate', a.imgs as 'pics', a.order_no as 'orderNo', a.fans_num as 'fansNums', a.status as 'status', temp.tags as 'tags', r.reason as 'reason'
from ho_offers a left join ho_apply_refund r on r.offer_id=a.id left join ho_user_basic b on a.user_id=b.id left join ho_dict d on d.id=a.user_plate left join ( select offer_id,GROUP_CONCAT(d.dict_value) as 'tags' from ho_offer_tag a left join ho_dict d on d.id=a.dict_id group by offer_id )temp on temp.offer_id=a.id where a.enable_flag='1' and a.status='RA' order by a.create_date desc
